body: At 3rd level, the superstitious barbarian gains a +1 bonus on initiative and a +1 insight bonus to AC during surprise rounds. This bonus increases by +1 for every three levels after 3rd. This ability replaces trap sense.
name: Sixth Sense
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Barbarian/Barbarian Archetypes/Superstitious/Sixth Sense
